articles.title: Gen Z Isn’t Done with Fashion; Just Editing It, Depop Reports
articles.mainIdea: Gen Z Isn’t Done with Fashion; Just Editing It, Depop Reports
articles.summary: Sourcing Journal: Depop has dropped “The Edited Self,” a 2026 trends forecast that predicts a major shift toward intentional and personalized fashion among re-shoppers.

articles.title: See list of 11 recalled products sold at Walmart, Amazon
articles.mainIdea: See list of 11 recalled products sold at Walmart, Amazon
articles.summary: USA TODAY: Eleven products sold at Walmart and Amazon were recalled for various safety concerns on Dec. 18.

articles.title: Can Shopify (SHOP) Turn Agentic AI and Sustainability Bets Into Durable Platform Advantage?
articles.mainIdea: Can Shopify (SHOP) Turn Agentic AI and Sustainability Bets Into Durable Platform Advantage?
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Over the past week, Shopify has been in focus as analysts highlighted its push into AI-enabled “agentic commerce,” new Winter ’26 Edition tools, and enhanced partnerships like the Contentsquare analytics tie-up, while broader industry attention also touched on regulatory actions affecting merchants selling medical‑grade products online. At the same time, Shopify’s growing role in AI-powered commerce infrastructure and its support for initiatives such as Frontier’s long-term carbon removal...
